author: Nick Nairn
method: Mix the flour, milk, salt and egg in a food processor. Heat the butter in a pan. Add the batter to the pan in two batches, frying for 1-2 minutes on each side, until golden. Serve with honey.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz self-raising flour,  ½ pint milk,  pinch salt,  1 free-range egg,  butter for frying,  honey, to serve
